title: Check Stock in Another Store
description: A customer wants an item that is out of stock. An associate needs to check if it's available at a nearby store.

tasks.description: Identify the product the customer wants by scanning a similar item or looking it up by name.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate finds the correct product SKU.

tasks.description: Use the inventory lookup tool to check stock levels for that item at other stores.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool shows that a nearby store has five units in stock.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the nearby store's location and offer to call them to hold the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate provides a solution for the customer to get the out-of-stock item.
